RESOLUTION 24-08

2025 CEMETERY OPENING AND CLOSING (SEXTON) FEES
​
Grave opening and closing fees for calendar 2025 are hereby set as follows:
Weekday

Weekend
Adult                         $782.00               $980.00
Infant                         $219.00               $409.00
Cremains                   $219.00               $409.00
​

For the year 2018 and each year thereafter, the rate shall increase by the most recent National Average Consumer Price Index – Urban increase for the previous year rounded to the nearest one dollar.

R
ESOLUTION 24-09
A RESOLUTION ADOPTING CEMETERY VAULT AND LINER OPTIONS

The City Council of the City of Pomeroy does hereby resolve as follows:

To offer customers options for full burial services as set forth below:

1.  The customer may purchase a vault or liner from a funeral home and is responsible for paying the associated fees of burial including the City’s opening and closing charges.

2.  The customer may decide not to purchase a vault or liner, at which point the City will collect  $151.00 for interment and $217.00 for settling fees in addition to its opening and closing charges.

Additionally, the City Clerk’s office will advise future customers that liners and vaults are strongly recommended for use at the Pomeroy city cemetery; however, they are not required.

Approved this 5th day of November, 2024:

Signed:                                                                        Attest:

RESOLUTION 2021-01
​

A resolution establishing a fee of $30.00 for locating and staking of headstones or monuments in the Pomeroy City Cemetery.

Dated March 9, 2021.
